data.system_settings: Surface Book Performance Base 8 GB, Windows 10 Pro x64 (Fall Creator's Update) Version 1709 (Build 16299.19)
data.client_settings: Discord Stable, Build Number: 6543, and Discord Canary, Build Number: 6557
data.actual_result: Nothing happens. No error message, no confirmation to send the message with the file, no message sent, NOTHING.
data.expected_result: If this bug did NOT exist, I should be able to send the file normally.
data.short_description: Discord can't upload a item from OneDrive with OneDrive Files On-Demand on the Windows 10 Fall Creator's Update. (OneDrive 17.3.7074.1023)
data.steps_to_repro: - Click the "+" button to insert a file. - Select a OneDrive file - Click Open.
